duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the asset management and operating performance of a diverse residential portfolio of real estate assets.
Drive value creation at the asset level by implementing strategies that grow income and reduce operating expenses.
Monitor capital improvement/new construction programs and approve changes in scope of work and estimated construction contracts.
Develop management, leasing, and capital investment strategies, as well as income/expense budgets for each asset.
Reviewing reports for variance from plan and opportunities to improve performance, and stay current on local market trends.
Gather and analyze data to understand each property’s position in the market and actively manage the valuation process.
Review and approve monthly draws for each project and check for project budget compliance, as well as visit assets on a periodic basis.
Develop marketing and leasing guidelines and promotion programs, and participate in dispositions process.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 5 years of institutional, Residential Asset Management experience.
